name: Cat Kingdom Defence
description:
Combining tower defence with platform games.

HOW TO PLAY:

You are a spherical cat who's objective is to spawn as many turrets as possible to attack the enemy tower. To do so you must jump on each platform to take control of it, but beware of enemies who will also try the same thing.

Controls:

First of all i highly recommend mapping your own input before playing. The only actions used are bounce, start, bounce Modifier and back.

To bounce, hold A/X or the right mouse button. to bounce higher hold down RT/Space. To roll on the ground use the left analogue stick or drag the mouse with the right mouse button down.

Press start or escape to pause.

When prompted in game over or on win.
Click the buttons or press A to retry, B to Quit.

Sorry for any bugs that may linger.
